casebody.data:
Cesar SABINO, Julio Morejon, Jaime Lourdes, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
WEST NEW YORK BOARD OF EDUCATION, Superintendent John Fauta, Clara Herrara, Defendants-Movants,
and
The Town of West New York, Defendant. M-846 September Term 2018
082695 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 3, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
